google_reviews.author: Marion Harvey
google_reviews.review:
If anyone is wanting a safe, up scale rental home, please consider Parkview Apartments.  They have ON SITE management, beautiful lounge (available to reserve), amazing management team, and awesome residents.

I can not say enough good about Parkeview Apartments.  My husband and I have had the wonderful experience of living at this beautiful property for going on 5 years.  Did I say management is outstanding?  Lynda and John

google_reviews.author: Joey F
google_reviews.review:
I have never lived anywhere with such a dedicated property management team. Cheryl and Alex are not only extremely kind and nice to talk to, they are also knowledgeable and quick to help if anything goes wrong.

I dont think I ever had to wait more than one day for any issue to be fixed- from a lightbulb going out to an oven that wasnt heating right.

The park right next door is also fantastic. Its a wonderful walk on which youll see a number of different species of birds in the spring/summer along with an abundance of rabbits. If you get lucky you may also get your eyes on one of the toads living by the pickle ball/basketball courts.

I cannot say enough good stuff about these two and this place. If youre torn between moving here and somewhere else- apply here.

google_reviews.author: Anna Maag
google_reviews.review: We loved living here! Cheryl and Alex are absolutely amazing! Very accommodating and fast with responses! The apartment complex itself, are very clean and professional. Units look brand new with nice appliances inside. We will miss it here!

google_reviews.author: Katelyn
google_reviews.review: We moved into the Park View Village Apartments sight unseen and Cheryl the property manager was so helpful and easy to communicate with.  She sent us videos of multiple units for us to choose between to best suit our needs prior to making our final decision.  She is by far the best property manager we've had the pleasure of leasing from.  Would recommend the property to others as not only are the apartment and community amenities great so is the management and service.   Cheryl and Alex are very responsive to work orders and get requests handled in a timely manner.  The apartment has a trail right behind it that leads to a park, which is great if you have pets or enjoy being outdoors.  If you are looking for an apartment to lease then look no further this is the spot for you.

google_reviews.author: Maddy Guilbaud
google_reviews.review: I really love this place! Cheryl the property manager is such a sweetheart who is the cherry on top of everything else great about living here. Alex is super quick and friendly when we put in work orders. The whole complex is quiet and friendly. We are close enough to everything to still feel like we live in town while being more secluded. 1000/10 recommendation if your looking at living here.

google_reviews.author: Esther Kukhahn
google_reviews.review: Very pretty place. It's has sucurd front doors ( you have to be buzzed in by someone that lives there or have your own key to unlock the doors)  once inside you come to find yourself in a upscale lobbie with very pleasant decorations and different seating options and arraignments.

google_reviews.author: Erik Bracht
google_reviews.review: The grounds are beautiful. The staff,  friendly and helpful. The move-in carts made available were priceless and the move-in condition of the apartment was excellent.

google_reviews.author: Doug Munger
google_reviews.review: Well maintained building and property manager stayed on top of everything while we lived there. We had no issues that weren't taken care of quickly and done right first time.

google_reviews.author: Xavier Van Diest
google_reviews.review: Apartment is lovely, and the process of getting into it was easy and stress free!

google_reviews.author: Daniel Fernandez
google_reviews.review: My friend lives here. Great neighborhood.

google_reviews.author: Payton Skoglund
google_reviews.review: Loved living here and was so thankful for the amazing management!

summary.text:
Good

Many residents at Park View Village Apartments appreciate the dedicated property management team. User reviews consistently highlight the quick and efficient handling of maintenance requests, with one tenant specifically noting that repairs such as lightbulb replacements and oven issues were addressed within a day. This prompt response to maintenance needs contributes significantly to resident satisfaction, ensuring that despite minor issues, the living experience remains positive. Additionally, reviewers commend the clean and professional environment, stating that the apartments appear brand new with high-quality appliances.

Furthermore, the location of the complex adds to its appeal, offering a walking trail that leads to a nearby park, a feature that pet owners and outdoor enthusiasts particularly enjoy. The community itself is described as quiet and friendly, providing a pleasant living atmosphere close to urban conveniences while still feeling secluded. Many reviews note the balanced blend of accessibility and tranquility, making it an attractive option for potential tenants. Overall, these elements make Park View Village a desirable choice for those seeking a well-maintained and conveniently located residence.

Great

Park View Village Apartments shine most brightly when it comes to the exceptional property management team. Reviews frequently praise Cheryl and Alex, the property managers, for their professionalism and approachability. Cheryl’s efforts, especially when helping prospective tenants choose their apartment sight unseen, by sending detailed videos and ensuring that all questions are answered promptly, have left a lasting positive impression on residents. This level of service and communication is a standout aspect of the management at Park View Village.

Moreover, the overall welcoming and secure environment of the complex greatly enhances its appeal. Residents mention the secured entrance, which provides an increased sense of safety and peace of mind. The attractive, upscale lobby and the well-maintained grounds add to the overall luxury feel of the residence. Many users highlight the ease of move-in as a notable feature, with practical move-in carts and apartments in pristine condition upon arrival. This comprehensive approach to resident care is likely a key factor in the overwhelmingly positive feedback the complex receives.

Bad

Despite the overwhelmingly positive feedback, there are limited negative reviews concerning Park View Village Apartments. However, one user did leave a neutral rating of three stars without accompanying comments, which might suggest some dissatisfaction. This isolated lower rating, contrasted with numerous five-star reviews, could indicate a disparity in expectations or experiences, but without further context or commentary, it's challenging to pinpoint specific issues.

Ugly

There are no significant complaints or negative experiences reported in the user reviews for Park View Village Apartments that would fall under the category of "ugly." The high average rating and consistent positive feedback speak to an overall well-managed and satisfactory living environment. The absence of troubling reviews suggests that the property management is successful in maintaining a high standard of living and promptly addressing potential problems before they escalate.
